title: Software List
description: Life is full of little things. We help you manage them systematically, using the most effective means to make you lazier and machines smarter, thus providing better services for people's lives.
subtitle: Science in life is you and me!
info: Open source software is free. Support if you can, don't support piracy if you can't. Below is a list of commonly used and good application official websites to help us quickly find the software you want and prevent beginners from being confused.
